titles.title: Social Security Right to Know Act
Social Security Right to Know Act
A bill to amend title XI of the Social Security Act to include additional information in Social Security account statements.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: Social Security Right To Know Act - Amends the Social Security Act to require Social Security account statements to contain additional information, such as: (1) a statement of the current Social Security tax rates applicable to wages and self-employment income, including an indication of the combined total of such rates of employee and employer taxes with respect to wages; and (2) a comparison of total annual Social Security tax inflows with the total annual benefits paid.
